attributes.action: Prevent indivduals from smoking in all manner of public arears (e.g. streets, outside amenities).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the smoking ban took effect in the UK, the burden has moved from inside to all outside public areas. Smoker’s now congregate outside business’ and work places. It is now impossible to go anywhere without experiencing second hand smoke. 

For example, I am forced to hold my 
breath every morning when I enter my work building (because of the plethora of people that loiter outside smoking). The same is true when you travel down any high street. 

This is not only unpleasant because of the smell, the rubbish and the unsightliness of it, but also because of the adverse medical consequences. 

Smoking is a private pastime, it causes unnecessary inconvenience and harm to the majority of the population and  accordingly should be restricted to people’s homes, (or at least areas in which non-smokers can avoid without unnecessary hassle).
